net.casper.data.model.filters

Class CDataFilterClause

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.casper.data.model.filters.CDataFilterClause

  • public class CDataFilterClause
extends Object
    Stores a list of filters with which to match a given cache. Any number of filters can be added to the filter clause chain. Filters will be evaluated in the order in which they are added to the clause.

    Note that filters will be evaluated via an "AND" relationship, which means that all filters must be matched in order for a record to qualify as a match on the clause. "OR"-based filters are accomodated by individual filters that can take multi-values as arguments to concrete constructors.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    $Revision: 111 $
    Author:
    Jonathan Liang

      • setCacheContainerCallbackOptimization

        public void setCacheContainerCallbackOptimization(CDataCacheContainer container)
                                           throws CDataGridException
        Optimizes filter list to allow PK exact matches to be run -first-. This is a a performance enhancement / optimization in the system. When this is called, the list of filters is rearranged to allow the PK to come first.
        Parameters:
        container -
        Throws:
        CDataGridException
